name: anonymous
description: Anonymous users can only view documents but not participate in the game.

name: Ancestors
description: Any person with an entrance in "date of death" is considered a "historical" person. This disables the person to participate in the game as users. They can only appear as authors of already existing documents and as characters in new documents.

name: Players
description: Players can, analyze and code historical and contemporary texts, as well as create new biographical and historiographical works.
